tagline: Where Every Cup Tells a Story
description: We are a specialty coffee roaster and caf√© dedicated to sourcing the finest beans from around the world. Our passionate baristas craft each cup with precision and care, creating an unforgettable coffee experience in a warm, inviting atmosphere.

about.story: Founded in 2018, Artisan Coffee House was born from a simple passion: to share exceptional coffee with our community. What started as a small roastery has grown into a beloved gathering place where coffee lovers can discover rare single-origin beans, expertly crafted espresso drinks, and fresh-baked pastries.
about.mission: To elevate the coffee experience by combining artisan craftsmanship with sustainable sourcing, creating a space where quality, community, and creativity come together.

values.title: Quality First
values.description: We source only the finest beans and use precision brewing methods to ensure every cup is perfect.

values.title: Sustainability
values.description: We partner with ethical farms and use eco-friendly practices to protect our planet.

values.title: Community
values.description: We create a welcoming space where connections are made over great coffee.

contact.address: Jl. Kopi Kenangan No. 123, Jakarta Selatan 12345

team.name: Sarah Anderson
team.bio: With 10 years of experience, Sarah brings artistry to every cup.

team.name: Michael Chen
team.bio: Michael's expertise in roasting brings out the best flavors in every bean.

team.name: Emily Rodriguez
team.bio: Emily creates fresh pastries daily using traditional techniques.

team.name: David Kim
team.bio: David's vision of community-centered coffee culture drives everything we do.

testimonials.name: Jessica M.
testimonials.comment: Best coffee in town! The atmosphere is cozy and the baristas really know their craft.

testimonials.name: Ryan T.
testimonials.comment: I come here every morning. The cappuccino is perfection and the pastries are always fresh.

testimonials.name: Amanda L.
testimonials.comment: Such a gem! Great coffee, friendly staff, and the perfect spot to work or catch up with friends.

testimonials.name: Daniel P.
testimonials.comment: The attention to detail here is amazing. Every drink is crafted with care. Highly recommend!
